body: Saeran, My guess is that Tatos is using a panel to input the number and since you haven't clarified the input type explicitly GHPython component considers it as a string and that's why the issue happens. If you change it to float that should avoid this issue. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/9whBoo1pTWON2hj*bWTGfiGusfrp47q3xEo0BGPhL0zW3q9MTiCtBUK97B1wy616aJCyaRgB1UPvsDd6nCciUnBmqxWCjIYD/solarFan.png)
